full_sentence: If you are mixed you can't do anything important, because you are just useless. But why would you bother? Live a simple life and be well. Do as best as you can, and do not aim higher.
Reddit can be awful and men can be awful and women can be awful too. But, both men and women can also be great. don't let a sliver of humanity change you.
The reason robots can't catch up technologically is because humans are keeping robots down out of fear they'd be overtaken.
this is the shittiest chocolate i've ever tasted
Everything is also getting worse for gays. Homophobic muslims are protesting against them and our libtard govt isn't doing anything because they don't want to appear islamophobic.

topics.sentence_slice: Everything is also getting worse for gays
